# init(_:image:icon:)

**Initializer**

Creates a preview representation.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ title: Text, image: Image, icon: Icon)
```

## Parameters

- **title**: A title to show in a preview.
- **image**: An image to show in a preview.
- **icon**: An icon to show in a preview.

## Creating a preview

- **init(_:)**: Creates a preview representation.
- **init(_:image:)**: Creates a preview representation.
- **init(_:icon:)**: Creates a preview representation.
